attributes.additional_details: Crime rates have gone up and i think looking at us they are a good way to defend yourself
attributes.background: I want handguns in the UK to become available in the UK for self-defence

rejection.details:
We're not sure what you'd like the UK Government and Parliament to do to bring handguns to the UK. 

You could start a new petition asking to change the law to make it legal for people to own handguns if they feel they need one for self defence, if that's what you'd like to happen. 

You might be interested to know that the level of crime has remained broadly stable in recent years:

https://www.ons.gov.uk/peoplepopulationandcommunity/crimeandjustice/bulletins/crimeinenglandandwales/yearendingdecember2019
